  • public class ParamsRetriever
extends com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.util.NamedParamsRetriever
    Enhanced version of parameters retriever.

      • getUuid

        public UUID getUuid(String param)
             throws com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error
        Returns UUID identifier from given parameter (not allowing null).
        Parameters:
        param - Parameter name.
        Returns:
        Parsed UUID identifier.
        Throws:
        com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error - On a missing parameter, bad type or null value (JSONRPC2Error.INVALID_PARAMS).

      • getUuid

                    boolean allowNull)
             throws com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error
        Returns UUID identifier from given parameter.
        Parameters:
        param - Parameter name.
        allowNull - Whether to allow NULL values or throw exception in such case.
        Returns:
        Parsed UUID identifier.
        Throws:
        com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error - On a missing parameter or bad type or null value (JSONRPC2Error.INVALID_PARAMS).

      • getOptUuid

        public UUID getOptUuid(String param)
                throws com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error
        Returns UUID identifier from given optional parameter (not allowing null).
        Parameters:
        param - Parameter name.
        Returns:
        Parsed UUID identifier. Note, that it may be NULL, if parameter is not set, but not when set to NULL.
        Throws:
        com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error - On a missing parameter, bad type or null value (JSONRPC2Error.INVALID_PARAMS).

      • getOptUuid

        Throws:

                         throws com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error

        Parsed UUID identifier.
        Throws:
        com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error - On bad format or null value (JSONRPC2Error.INVALID_PARAMS).

      • getBean

        public <Type> Type getBean(String param,
                           Class<Type> type,
                           boolean allowNull)
                    throws com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error
        Retrieves typed bean from sub-map located under specified entry.
        Type Parameters:
        Type - Destination bean type.
        Parameters:
        param - Property map parameter name.
        type - Destination bean class.
        allowNull - Whether NULL should be accepted as bean value.
        Returns:
        Populated bean.
        Throws:
        com.thetransactioncompany.jsonrpc2.JSONRPC2Error - When parameters reading fails.
